amendment.description: To improve the Office of the Flood Insurance Advocate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4706 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4706 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3862-3866, S3872; text as modified: CR S3862-3864) To improve the Office of the Flood Insurance Advocate.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4706 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4706 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 4707.
